blog-write: Add, modify, and delete user's blog
chord: Access chord endpoint, have read access to user's chord
files-write: Upload files to user's account, modify, and delete user's files
messages: Read user's chat room and messages
messages-write: Add and delete user's chat room and messages
quiz: Access quiz endpoint, have read access to user's messages
toko: Read user's toko, toko-users, toko-items, and toko-transactions
toko-write: Add, modify, and delete user's toko, toko-users, toko-items, and toko-transactions
url-shortener-write: Add and delete user's url shortener
user: Read user's following, follower, profile, media
user-write: Modify user's following, follower, profile, media
